test.name: trim_whitespaces
test.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS whitespaces(value String) ENGINE = MergeTree() PARTITION BY tuple() ORDER BY tuple()
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO whitespaces SELECT value FROM (SELECT arrayStringConcat(groupArray(' ')) AS spaces, concat(spaces, toString(any(number)), spaces) AS value FROM numbers(100000000) GROUP BY pow(number, intHash32(number) % 4) % 12345678)
test.query: SELECT count() FROM whitespaces WHERE NOT ignore({func})
